Revenge.Name: Revengeance
Revenge.Tooltip:
READ ALL OF THIS
Activates revengeance mode, can only be used in expert mode.
Activates rage, which is a new stat.  When rage is maxed press V to activate rage mode.
You gain rage whenever you take damage.
Activates adrenaline, which is a new stat.  When adrenaline is maxed press B to activate adrenaline mode.
You gain adrenaline whenever a boss is alive.  Getting hit drops adrenaline back to 0.
If you hit max adrenaline and don't use it within 5 seconds your adrenaline damage will drop gradually.
All enemies drop 5 times the cash and enemy spawn rates are boosted.
You do 5% MORE damage but you also take 5% MORE damage (this is only active after your first boss kill).
Before you have killed your first boss you take 20% LESS damage from everything.
Changes ALL boss AIs in vanilla and the Calamity Mod.
DO NOT USE IF A BOSS IS ALIVE!
Only use if you are absolutely sure you want to go through with this!

读完以下内容
开启复仇模式，仅在专家模式可用。

Removes the bleed effect caused by the abyss
Grants the ability to swim and greatly extends underwater breathing
Provides light underwater and extra mobility on ice
Provides a moderate amount of light in the abyss
Greatly reduces breath loss in the abyss
Reduces creature's ability to detect you in the abyss
Reduces the defense reduction that the abyss causes
Allows you to fall faster while in liquids

消除深渊怪物造成的流血效应

DimensionalSoulArtifact.Name: Dimensional Soul Artifact
DimensionalSoulArtifact.Tooltip:
Power
Boosts all damage and critical strike chance by 15%
This boost bypasses the damage and critical strike chance caps, but at what cost?
DimensionalSoulArtifact.TooltipTranslation:
力量
增加15%全伤害和暴击率
这个提升复仇模式的伤害和暴击上限，但是要付出什么代价？

Dragonfruit.Name: Dragonfruit
Dragonfruit.Tooltip:
Permanently increases maximum life by 25
Can only be used if the max amount of life fruit has been consumed
Dragonfruit.TooltipTranslation:
永久增加25点最大生命值
你必须在生命值最大的情况下才能使用（使用20个生命果之后）

Ectoheart.Name: Ectoheart
Ectoheart.Tooltip:
Permanently makes Adrenaline Mode take 5 less seconds to charge
Revengeance drop
Ectoheart.TooltipTranslation:
永久让肾上腺素模式减少5秒的时间充能
复仇模式掉落

Elderberry.Name: Elderberry
Elderberry.Tooltip:
Permanently increases maximum life by 25
Can only be used if the max amount of life fruit has been consumed
Elderberry.TooltipTranslation:
永久增加25点最大生命值
你必须在最大生命值的情况下才能使用（使用20个生命果）

EldritchSoulArtifact.Name: Eldritch Soul Artifact
EldritchSoulArtifact.Tooltip:
Knowledge
Boosts melee speed by 10%, shoot speed by 25%, throwing damage by 10%, max minions by 2, and reduces mana cost by 15%
EldritchSoulArtifact.TooltipTranslation:
知识
提高10%近战速度，25%远程速度，10%投掷伤害，+2最大召唤上限，降低15%魔力消耗

ElectrolyteGelPack.Name: Electrolyte Gel Pack
ElectrolyteGelPack.Tooltip:
Permanently makes Adrenaline Mode take 10 less seconds to charge
Revengeance drop
ElectrolyteGelPack.TooltipTranslation:
永久让肾上腺素模式减少10秒的时间充能
复仇模式掉落

EssenceofCinder.Name: Essence of Cinder
EssenceofCinder.Tooltip: The essence of sky and storm creatures

Fabsol.Name: Fabsol
Fabsol.TooltipTranslation:
召唤一匹非常快的小马
复仇模式掉落

GodlySoulArtifact.Name: Godly Soul Artifact
GodlySoulArtifact.TooltipTranslation:
忠诚
+8召唤上限和你意想不到的事情

InfernalBlood.Name: Infernal Blood
InfernalBlood.Tooltip:
Permanently makes Rage Mode do 20% (80% in Death Mode) more damage
Revengeance drop
InfernalBlood.TooltipTranslation:
永久增加愤怒伤害20%（死亡模式80%）的伤害
复仇模式掉落

IronHeart.Name: Iron Heart
IronHeart.Tooltip:
Makes dying while a boss is alive permanently kill you.
This mode cannot be toggled on and off.
Using this while a boss is alive will permanently kill you.
Cannot be activated if any boss has been killed.
IronHeart.TooltipTranslation:
Boss会永久的杀死你
此模式不能切换和关闭。
当boss活着的时候用这个会永久地杀死你。
如果有任何boss被杀，就无法激活。

Knowledge.Name: The Desert Scourge
Knowledge.Tooltip:
The great sea worm appears to have survived the extreme heat and has even adapted to it.
What used to be a majestic beast swimming through the water has now become a dried-up and
gluttonous husk on a constant and voracious search for its next meal.
Knowledge.TooltipTranslation:
巨大的海虫似乎已经在极端高温中存活下来，甚至适应了这个地方
曾经是一只海洋中的一种可怕生物，现在已经变成了枯竭的动物
它一直贪婪的寻找这下一顿饭
（彼海的守护者-荒漠灾虫）

Knowledge10.Name: The Ocean
Knowledge10.Tooltip:
Take care to not disturb the deep waters of this world.
You may awaken something more terrifying than death itself.
Knowledge10.TooltipTranslation:
小心不要打扰这个世界的深渊.
你可以唤醒比死亡还可怕的东西

Knowledge11.Name: The Brain of Cthulhu
Knowledge11.Tooltip:
An eye and now a brain.
Most likely another abomination spawned from this inchoate mass of flesh.
Knowledge11.TooltipTranslation:
眼睛，现在成了大脑
最有可能的是另一种仇恨从这种早期肉身中产生的
（血腥之地的主人-克苏鲁之脑）

Knowledge12.Name: The Eater of Worlds
Knowledge12.Tooltip:
Perhaps it was just a giant worm infected by the microbe.
Seems likely given the origins of this place.
Knowledge12.TooltipTranslation:
也许它只是一只被微生物感染的巨虫.
它似乎是这个地方的起源
（腐化之地的主人-世界吞噬者）

Knowledge13.Name: The Perforators and their Hive
Knowledge13.Tooltip:
An abomination of comingled flesh, bone, and organ; infested primarily by blood-slurping worms.
The chunks left over from the brain must have been absorbed by the crimson and reconstituted into that thing.
Knowledge13.TooltipTranslation:
一种可怕的肉、骨头和器官的巢穴；主要由血液中的蠕虫感染
从克苏鲁之脑撕扯下来的肉一定是被寄生虫吸收并重新组成了这个东西
（贪婪的寄生虫-血肉寄生者）

Knowledge14.Name: The Hive Mind
Knowledge14.Tooltip:
A hive of clustered microbial-infected flesh.
Sadly I do not believe killing it will lessen the corruption here.
Knowledge14.TooltipTranslation:
被微生物感染的巢穴
可悲的是，我不相信杀死它会减少这里的腐化生物
（腐化生物的聚集地-腐化大脑）

Knowledge15.Name: The Slime God
Knowledge15.Tooltip:
It is a travesty, one of the most threatening biological terrors ever born.
If this creature were allowed to combine every slime on the planet then it would be nearly unstoppable.
Knowledge15.TooltipTranslation:
这也是一种生物，但是这种是最有威胁的生物
如果这个生物可以将地球上的每一个粘液结合起来，那么它几乎是不可阻挡的
（混元归一-史莱姆之神）

Knowledge16.Name: Queen Bee
Knowledge16.Tooltip:
As crude as the giant insects are they can prove useful in certain situations.
...given the ability to control them.
Knowledge16.TooltipTranslation:
它们和巨型昆虫一样粗糙，在某些情况下可以证明是有用的
....除非你可以驯服它们
（巨型蜂巢的统治者-丛林蜂后）

Knowledge17.Name: Skeletron
Knowledge17.Tooltip:
The curse is said to only affect the elderly.
After they are afflicted they become an immortal vessel for an ancient demon of the underworld.
Knowledge17.TooltipTranslation:
据说它的诅咒只会影响老年人
他们受苦后，就成了冥冥中一个古老恶魔的容器
（诅咒灵魂-诅咒骷髅王）

Knowledge18.Name: Wall of Flesh
Knowledge18.Tooltip:
I see the deed is done.
The unholy amalgamation of flesh and hatred has been defeated.
Prepare to face the true terrors that lurk in the light and dark parts of this world.
Knowledge18.TooltipTranslation:
我看到契约已经完成了
肉体和仇恨的结合被打败了
准备面对潜藏在这个世界中光明和黑暗的恐惧
（世界的核心-血肉墙）

Knowledge19.Name: Cryogen
Knowledge19.Tooltip:
You managed to bring down what dozens of sorcerers long ago could not.
I am unsure if it has grown weaker over the decades of imprisonment.
Knowledge19.TooltipTranslation:
它把几十年前的巫师囚禁了
我不确定它是否在数十年的监禁中变得越来越弱
（被囚禁的灵魂-冰川冻灵）

Knowledge2.Name: Duke Fishron
Knowledge2.Tooltip:
The mutant terror of the sea was once the trusted companion of an old king who tamed it using its favorite treat.
Long ago, the creature flew in desperation from the raging bloody inferno consuming its home, ultimately finding its way to the ocean.
Knowledge2.TooltipTranslation:
猪龙鲨曾经是一位老国王信任的伴侣，他用它最喜欢的款待驯服了它
很久以前，这种生物从熊熊烈火中绝望地飞出，吞噬了它的家园，最终找到了通往海洋的路
（海洋霸主-猪龙鲨公爵）

Knowledge20.Name: The Mechanical Bosses
Knowledge20.Tooltip:
I see you have awakened Draedon's toys.
Once useful tools turned into savage beasts when their AIs went rogue, a mistake that Draedon failed to rectify in time.
Knowledge20.TooltipTranslation:
我看你已经唤醒了这些机器
一旦有用的工具变成野兽，当他们的人工智能变成灾难，一个错误，嘉登没有及时纠正

Knowledge21.Name: The Destroyer
Knowledge21.Tooltip:
A machine brought to life by the mighty souls of warriors and built to excavate massive tunnels in planets to gather resources.
Could have proven useful if he didn't have an obsession with turning everything into a tool of destruction.
Knowledge21.TooltipTranslation:
一种由勇士强大的灵魂制造的机器，并在行星上挖掘大量的隧道来收集资源
如果他不执着于把一切都毁灭，那就证明是有用的
（破坏一切的机器-毁灭者）

Knowledge22.Name: The Twins
Knowledge22.Tooltip:
The bio-mechanical watchers of the night, originally created as security using the souls extracted from human eyes.
These creatures did not belong in this world, it's best to be rid of them.
Knowledge22.TooltipTranslation:
夜间的生物机械观察者，最初是用从人眼中提取出来的灵魂作为材料的
这些生物不属于这个世界，最好是消灭它们
（机械观察者-双子魔眼）

Knowledge23.Name: Skeletron Prime
Knowledge23.Tooltip:
What a silly and pointless contraption for something created with the essence of pure terror.
Draedon obviously took several liberties with his design of this thing...I am not impressed.  Better off destroyed.
Knowledge23.TooltipTranslation:
用纯粹恐惧的本质创造的装置
嘉登显然对它的设计有了几点自由……我没有印象
（钢铁杀手-机械骷髅王）

Knowledge24.Name: Calamitas Doppelganger
Knowledge24.Tooltip:
You are indeed stronger than I thought.
Though the bloody inferno still lingers, observing your progress...
Knowledge24.TooltipTranslation:
你确实比我想象的要坚强
虽然血腥的地狱依然存在，观察你的进展...
（被诅咒的女孩-灾厄眼）

Knowledge25.Name: Plantera
Knowledge25.Tooltip:
Well done, you killed a plant.
However, this plant was used as a vessel to house the spirits of those unfortunate enough to find their way down here.
I wish you luck in dealing with the fallout.
Knowledge25.TooltipTranslation:
干得好，你打败一棵植物
然而，这种植物只是一个器皿，用来容纳那些不幸的人的灵魂
我希望你在处理放射性沉降物方面运气好.
（丛林的畸形怪花-世纪之花）

Knowledge26.Name: Brimstone Elemental
Knowledge26.Tooltip:
The most powerful of the elementals, bent on exacting revenge upon the bloody inferno that demolished her home.
Finally put to rest, she will suffer no longer from the grief caused by the deaths of her people.
Knowledge26.TooltipTranslation:
最强大的元素，一心要报复血腥的地狱摧毁了她的家
最后，安息，她将不再遭受由她的人民死亡造成的悲痛
（元素之心-硫磺火元素）

Knowledge27.Name: Aquatic Scourge
Knowledge27.Tooltip:
A horror born of pollution and insatiable hunger; based on size alone this was merely a juvenile.
These Scourge creatures are the largest aquatic predators and very rarely do they frequent such shallow waters.
Knowledge27.TooltipTranslation:
一种由污染和饥饿所产生的恐惧，仅仅基于大小，这只是一个少年
这些天灾生物是最大的水生捕食者，它们很少会在这样的浅水水域频繁飞行
（彼海的守护者-硫海灾虫）

Knowledge28.Name: Leviathan and Siren
Knowledge28.Tooltip:
An odd pair of creatures.  One seeking companionship and the other seeking sustenance.
Perhaps two genetic misfits outcast from their homes that found comfort in assisting one another.
Knowledge28.TooltipTranslation:
奇怪的一对生物，一个寻求友谊，另一个寻求寄托
也许两个遗传失调的人从他们的家中被遗弃，在互相帮助中找到了安慰
（彼此的守护-利维坦，塞壬）

Knowledge29.Name: Astrum Deus
Knowledge29.Tooltip:
God of the stars and spreader of the astral infection.
Though it was not the progenitor of the infection, that scaleless beast is still out there, devouring celestial bodies by the dozens.
Knowledge29.TooltipTranslation:
星际之神和星体传染的播撒者
虽然它不是感染的先驱，但是那只可怕的野兽仍然在那里，吞噬着数十个天体
（行星的毁灭者-星辉吞噬者）

Knowledge3.Name: The Eye of Cthulhu
Knowledge3.Tooltip:
That eye...how peculiar.
I sensed it watching you more intensely as you grew stronger.
Knowledge3.TooltipTranslation:
那只眼睛…多么奇怪
我感觉到它越来越强烈地注视着你
（可怕的眼球-克苏鲁之眼）

Knowledge30.Name: Astrum Aureus
Knowledge30.Tooltip:
A titanic cyborg infected by a star-borne disease expelled from the belly of an ancient god.
The destruction of this creature will not prevent the spread of the disease.
Knowledge30.TooltipTranslation:
一种由一个古老的神的诞生的蛋
这种生物的破坏不会阻止疾病的传播
（宇宙的凝胶-末日星辉史莱姆）

Knowledge31.Name: Golem
Knowledge31.Tooltip:
To think my people once worshipped this thing as a god...
We have come far since those ancient times.
Knowledge31.TooltipTranslation:
认为我的人民曾经崇拜这个东西作为一个神… 
我们自古以来就走得很远
（丛林信徒供奉的神-石巨人）

Knowledge32.Name: The Plaguebringer Goliath
Knowledge32.Tooltip:
A beautiful amalgam of steel, flesh, and infection.  Capable of destroying an entire civilization in just one onslaught.
Its plague nuke barrage can leave an entire area uninhabitable for months...at least concerning certain species.
Knowledge32.TooltipTranslation:
一个由钢、肉和瘟疫的制造机械蜜蜂。能够在一次猛攻中摧毁整个文明
它的瘟疫导弹可以使整个地区无法居住几个月…至少是某些生物
（传播瘟疫的工具-歌莉娅）

Knowledge33.Name: Ravager
Knowledge33.Tooltip:
One of many flesh golems crafted through forbidden necromancy to counter my unstoppable forces.
Its creators were slaughtered by it moments after its conception.  It's for the best that is has been destroyed.
Knowledge33.TooltipTranslation:
许多肉体傀儡通过禁制巫术来对付我不可阻挡的力量。
它的创造者在它构思之后的瞬间被屠杀了。最好的是已经被摧毁了
（暴君的仆从-毁灭魔像）

Knowledge34.Name: The Red Moon
Knowledge34.Tooltip:
We long ago feared the light of the red moon.
Many went mad, others died, but a scant few became blessed with a wealth of cosmic understanding.
Knowledge34.TooltipTranslation:
我们很久以前就害怕红月亮的光芒
许多人疯了，其他人死了，但很少有人得到了战利品

Knowledge4.Name: Lunatic Cultist
Knowledge4.Tooltip:
The gifted one that terminated my grand summoning so long ago with his uncanny powers over the arcane.
Someone I once held in such contempt for his actions is now...deceased, his sealing ritual undone...prepare for the end.
Your impending doom approaches...
Knowledge4.TooltipTranslation:
那个天才的人，用他不可思议的力量超越神秘，结束了我伟大的召唤
轻蔑他的行为的人现在已经死了，他的密封仪式未完成……准备结束
你即将来临的厄运逼近…
（可怕的信徒-拜月教邪教徒）

Knowledge5.Name: Crabulon
Knowledge5.Tooltip:
A crab and its mushrooms, a love story.
It's interesting how creatures can adapt given certain circumstances.
Knowledge5.TooltipTranslation:
一只螃蟹和它的蘑菇，一个爱情故事
在某些情况下生物如何适应是有趣的.
（命运共同体-菌生蟹）

Knowledge6.Name: Brimstone Crag
Knowledge6.Tooltip:
Ah...this place.
The scent of broken promises, pain, and eventual death is heavy in the air...
Knowledge6.TooltipTranslation:
啊…这个地方
破碎的承诺、痛苦和最终的死亡的气息在空气中是沉重的…

Knowledge7.Name: The Underworld
Knowledge7.Tooltip:
These obsidian and hellstone towers were once home to thousands of...'people'.
Unfortunately for them they were twisted by their inner demons until they were beyond saving.
Knowledge7.TooltipTranslation:
这些黑曜石和地狱石塔曾经是成千上万人的家园
不幸的是，他们被他们内心的恶魔扭曲，直到他们无法拯救

Knowledge8.Name: The Crimson
Knowledge8.Tooltip:
This bloody hell, spawned from a formless mass of flesh that fell from the stars eons ago.
It is now home to many hideous creatures, spawned from the pumping blood and lurching organs deep within.
Knowledge8.TooltipTranslation:
这个血腥地狱，从一个无形的肉块中诞生，从很久以前就从天上掉下来
它现在是许多可怕生物的家园，从心脏和深层器官中出生。

Knowledge9.Name: The Corruption
Knowledge9.Tooltip:
Ah, the rotten and forever-deteriorating landscape of infected life, brought upon by a deadly microbe long ago.
It is rumored that this microbe was created by a race predating the Terrarians.
Knowledge9.TooltipTranslation:
啊，很久以前，一种致命微生物所带来的腐烂和永远恶化的感染生命的景象
据传，这种微生物是由一个比土卫六早的种族创造的

MiracleFruit.Name: Miracle Fruit
MiracleFruit.Tooltip:
Permanently increases maximum life by 25
Can only be used if the max amount of life fruit has been consumed
MiracleFruit.TooltipTranslation:
永久增加25点最大生命值
你必须将生命值加到最大才能使用（使用20个生命果）

MushroomPlasmaRoot.Name: Mushroom Plasma Root
MushroomPlasmaRoot.Tooltip:
Permanently makes Rage Mode do 20% (80% in Death Mode) more damage
Revengeance drop
MushroomPlasmaRoot.TooltipTranslation:
永久增加愤怒20%伤害（死亡模式80%)伤害
复仇模式掉落

OldPowerCell.Name: Old Power Cell
OldPowerCell.Tooltip: Summons the ancient golem when used in the Temple
OldPowerCell.TooltipTranslation: 在丛林蜥蜴祭坛处召唤石巨人

PhantomHeart.Name: Phantom Heart
PhantomHeart.TooltipTranslation: 永久增加50点最大码魔力值

PotionofOmniscience.Name: Potion of Omniscience
PotionofOmniscience.Tooltip: Gives creature, danger, and treasure detection
PotionofOmniscience.TooltipTranslation: 获得矿物勘探，生物探测，危险探测效果

PurifiedJam.Name: Purified Jam
PurifiedJam.Tooltip:
Makes you immune to all damage and most debuffs for 10 seconds (5 seconds in Death Mode)
Causes potion sickness when consumed
Cannot be consumed while potion sickness is active
Revengeance drop
PurifiedJam.TooltipTranslation:
让你对所有伤害和绝大多数伤害10秒（死亡模式5秒）免疫
使用时引起药水疾病 
拥有药水疾病效果不能使用
复仇模式掉落

RedLightningContainer.Name: Red Lightning Container
RedLightningContainer.Tooltip:
Permanently makes Rage Mode do 20% (80% in Death Mode) more damage
Revengeance drop
RedLightningContainer.TooltipTranslation:
永久增加愤怒20%伤害（死亡模式80%)伤害
复仇模式掉落

RevivifyPotion.Name: Revivify Potion
RevivifyPotion.Tooltip: Causes enemy attacks to heal you for a fraction of their damage for 15 seconds
RevivifyPotion.TooltipTranslation: 攻击敌人来治疗自身，15秒

StarlightFuelCell.Name: Starlight Fuel Cell
StarlightFuelCell.Tooltip:
Permanently makes Adrenaline Mode take 10 less seconds to charge
Revengeance drop
StarlightFuelCell.TooltipTranslation:
永久让肾上腺素减少10秒的时间充能
复仇模式掉落

StarterBag.Name: Starter Bag
StarterBag.NameTranslation: 新手礼包（一元开启，你买不了吃亏）

SuperDummy.Name: Super Dummy
SuperDummy.Tooltip:
Creates a super dummy
Regenerates 1 million life per second
Will not die when taking damage over time from debuffs
Right click to kill all super dummies
SuperDummy.TooltipTranslation:
创造超级傀儡
每秒恢复生命100万
不会因死亡而受到伤害
右击杀死所有超级傀儡

TitanScalePotion.Name: Titan Scale Potion
TitanScalePotion.Tooltip: Increases knockback, defense by 5, and damage reduction by 5%
TitanScalePotion.TooltipTranslation: 增加击退，增加5防御，伤害减少5%

YharimsStimulants.Name: Yharim's Stimulants
YharimsStimulants.Tooltip: Gives decent buffs to ALL offensive and defensive stats

ZergPotion.Name: Zerg Potion
ZergPotion.TooltipTranslation: 你附近会出现数不清的的怪物

EnchantedPearl.Name: Enchanted Pearl
EnchantedPearl.Tooltip:
Increases fishing skill
Crate potion effect, does not stack with crate potions
EnchantedPearl.TooltipTranslation:
提高钓鱼技能
宝匣药水效果，不与宝匣药水叠加

IOU.Name: IOU an item
IOU.Tooltip:
Use to craft any Leviathan weapon you want
Combine with Living Shards from Plantera to get your item!
IOU.TooltipTranslation:
用于制造任何你想要的利维坦武器
与来自世花的丛林碎片组合来获得你的物品

LeviathanAmbergris.Name: Leviathan Ambergris
LeviathanAmbergris.Tooltip:
You leave behind poisonous seawater as you move
75% increased movement speed, 10% increase to all damage, and plus 20 defense while submerged in liquid
If you are damaged while submerged in liquid you will gain a damaging aura for a short time
Being outside of liquid decreases all damage done by 5% but increases damage reduction by 5%
LeviathanAmbergris.TooltipTranslation:
当你移动时，你会留下有毒的海水
浸没在液体中增加75%移动速度，增加10%所有伤害，20防御，
如果你被淹没在液体中，你会在短时间内获得破坏性的光环
在液体之外减少5%所有伤害，但伤害减少5%

BloodyWormTooth.Name: Bloody Worm Tooth
BloodyWormTooth.Tooltip:
5% increased damage reduction and increased melee stats
10% increased damage reduction and melee stats when below 50% life
BloodyWormTooth.TooltipTranslation:
增加5%伤害减少和增加近战状态
当生命值低于50%时增加10%的伤害减少和近战状态

AbsoluteZero.Name: Absolute Zero

DeliciousMeat.Name: Delicious Meat

EternalBlizzard.Name: Eternal Blizzard

EternalBlizzard.TooltipTranslation: 木箭变成冰柱箭，在撞击后破碎。

FrostyFlare.Name: Frosty Flare

Sticks to enemies

FrostyFlare.TooltipTranslation:
不择手段
产生冰雨

Increases life regen as life decreases

你将免疫一次致命的伤害，并在3分钟的冷却时间内恢复30％的生命

WintersFury.Name: Winter's Fury
WintersFury.Tooltip: The pages are freezing to the touch

AstrageldonMusicbox.Name: Music Box (Astrum Aureus)
AstrageldonMusicbox.NameTranslation: 音乐盒(末日星辉史莱姆奖章)

DoGMusicbox.Name: Music Box (DoG Phase 1)
DoGMusicbox.NameTranslation: 音乐盒(神明吞噬者第1阶段)

ExodiumClusterOre.Name: Exodium Cluster
ExodiumClusterOre.Tooltip: A cold cluster from the great unknown.
ExodiumClusterOre.TooltipTranslation: 一个来自巨大未知的迷团

PlaguebringerMusicbox.Name: Music Box (Plaguebringer Goliath)
PlaguebringerMusicbox.NameTranslation: 音乐盒(瘟疫使者歌莉娅)

Abomination.Name: Abombination
Abomination.Tooltip: Calls in the airborne jungle abomination

BloomStone.Name: Bloom Stone

BloomStone.TooltipTranslation:
古代遗物之一

玩家的生命85%以上会失明

+5% max life, 5% damage reduction, 15 defense, and 10% increased damage
These effects are stronger on revengeance mode

给你和你的团队中所有其他玩家+1生命再生

ElysianWings.Name: Elysian Wings

Excellent acceleration: 2.5
Excellent flight time: 220
Temporary immunity to lava
ElysianWings.TooltipTranslation:
优秀的加速度：2.5
飞行时间：220 
临时免疫熔岩

Can only be used during daytime

邪恶火焰的核心

Can only be used during daytime
Not consumable

邪恶火焰的核心

Magic healing if mana is below 5% of its maximum

增加50最大魔力，魔法伤害增加6%

Death

死亡
在玩家周围创建一个大的竞技场

无限使用

召唤神明吞噬者
无限使用

HerringStaff.Name: Herring Staff

SeethingDischarge.TooltipTranslation: 会使敌人发生硫磺爆炸

Barinade.Name: Barinade

StormSpray.Name: Storm Spray

Revengeance drop

传说武器

中等概率发射鲨鱼

分解一切

你的血量越低，这把武器造成的伤害越高

Animosity.Name: Animosity

50% chance to not consume ammo

Revengeance drop

Unleashes interdimensional projection magic

基于你所在的生物群系发射跟踪抛射物
当击中敌人时基于你所在的生物群系你获得Buff
抛射物也会基于月相改变

ArkoftheElements.Name: Ark of the Elements
ArkoftheElements.Tooltip: A heavenly blade infused with the essence of Terraria
ArkoftheElements.TooltipTranslation: 一把灌注了泰拉瑞亚精华的神圣之刃

ArterialAssault.Name: Arterial Assault

AstralStaff.Name: Astral Staff

发射星辉之箭
暴君之母的神弓

尽管灾难降临时，为了保护家人，她仍旧把这把弓藏得很紧

BladecrestOathsword.Name: Bladecrest Oathsword

BloodfireArrow.Name: Bloodfire Arrow

BlossomFlux.Name: Blossom Flux

Legendary Drop

Revengeance drop

传说武器

有机会降低敌人50防御

idk I'm miserable with names

SanguineFlare.Tooltip: Fires a blast of sanguine flares that drain enemy life
SanguineFlare.TooltipTranslation: 燃起一阵阵血色的流血来消灭敌人的生命

Scorpion.Name: Scorpio
Scorpion.Tooltip:
Rockets
Right click to change modes
Scorpion.TooltipTranslation:
使用火箭作为弹药

SDFMG.Name: SDFMG
SDFMG.Tooltip:
It came from the edge of Terraria
50% chance to not consume ammo
SDFMG.TooltipTranslation:
它来自Terraria的边缘 
50%几率不耗费弹药

ShadecrystalTome.Name: Shadecrystal Barrage

ShadecrystalTome.TooltipTranslation: 召唤快速火焰阴影，一次可以射出两个水晶

ShadowboltStaff.Name: Shadowbolt Staff
ShadowboltStaff.Tooltip: The more tiles and enemies the beam bounces off of or travels through the more damage the beam does
ShadowboltStaff.TooltipTranslation: 更多的分裂和敌人的光束反弹或穿过造成更多的伤害

Shimmerspark.Name: Shimmerspark

SHPC.Name: SHPC

Legendary Drop
Fires plasma orbs that linger and emit massive explosions
Right click to fire a powerful energy beam
Revengeance drop

传说武器
发射等离子球体，触碰并发出大量爆炸
右键切换攻击方式
复仇模式掉落

Shredder.Name: Shredder
Shredder.Tooltip:
The myth, the legend, the weapon that drops more frames than any other
Fires a barrage of energy bolts that split and bounce
Right click to fire a barrage of normal bullets
Shredder.TooltipTranslation:
神话，传奇武器比其他任何东西落下更多
点燃一连串分裂和反弹的能量螺旋球
右击射击普通子弹的弹幕

SkyGlaze.Name: Sky Glaze
SkyGlaze.Tooltip: Fires feathers from the sky that stick to enemies and tiles and explode
SkyGlaze.TooltipTranslation: 从天空中掠过敌人和碎片的爆炸羽毛

SolsticeClaymore.Name: Solstice Claymore
SolsticeClaymore.Tooltip:
Changes projectile color based on the time of year
Inflicts daybroken during the day and nightwither during the night
SolsticeClaymore.TooltipTranslation:
圣诞节掉落
根据年度时间改变射弹颜色

SoulHarvester.Name: Soul Harvester
SoulHarvester.Tooltip: Enemies explode when on low health, spreading the plague
SoulHarvester.TooltipTranslation: 敌人在低生命时爆炸，传播瘟疫

SpearofPaleolith.Name: Spear of Paleolith
SpearofPaleolith.Tooltip:
Throws an ancient spear that shatters enemy armor at high velocity
Spears rain fossil shards as they travel
SpearofPaleolith.TooltipTranslation:
扔出一个古老的矛，以高速击碎敌人的装甲
投掷物经过的地方会释放古代化石

SpectralstormCannon.Name: Spectralstorm Cannon
SpectralstormCannon.Tooltip:
70% chance to not consume flares
Fires a storm of ectoplasm and flares
SpectralstormCannon.TooltipTranslation:
70%几率不耗费弹药
引发一场狂暴的暴风雨和耀斑

SporeKnife.Name: Spore Knife
SporeKnife.Tooltip: Enemies release spore clouds on death
SporeKnife.TooltipTranslation: 敌人在死亡时释放孢子云

Spyker.Name: Spyker
Spyker.Tooltip: Fires spikes that stick to enemies/tiles and explode into shrapnel that also stick to enemies/tiles and explode
Spyker.TooltipTranslation: 发射钉在敌人身上的钉子/钉子爆炸成榴霰弹也钉在敌人上/碎片和爆炸

StardustStaff.Name: Eidolon Staff
StardustStaff.Tooltip: The power of an ancient cultist resonates within this staff

StellarStriker.Name: Stellar Striker
StellarStriker.Tooltip: Summons a swarm of lunar flares from the sky on enemy hits
StellarStriker.TooltipTranslation: 从敌人的天空中召唤出一大片的月球耀斑

StormRuler.Name: Storm Ruler
StormRuler.Tooltip: Only a storm can fell a greatwood

StormSurge.Name: Storm Surge
StormSurge.Tooltip:
Fear the storm
Does not consume ammo
StormSurge.TooltipTranslation:
可怕的风暴
不消耗弹药

StreamGouge.Name: Stream Gouge
StreamGouge.Tooltip:
Fires an essence flame beam
This spear ignores npc immunity frames
StreamGouge.TooltipTranslation:
点燃宇宙火焰光束
这个矛无视NPC免疫时间

SunGodStaff.Name: Sun God Staff
SunGodStaff.Tooltip: Summons a solar god spirit to protect you

SunSpiritStaff.Name: Sun Spirit Staff
SunSpiritStaff.Tooltip: Summons a solar spirit to protect you
SunSpiritStaff.TooltipTranslation: 召唤一颗太阳来保护你

TearsofHeaven.Name: Tears of Heaven
TearsofHeaven.Tooltip: Casts slow-moving balls of heavenly light
TearsofHeaven.TooltipTranslation: 投射缓慢移动的天光球

TerraArrow.Name: Terra Arrow
TerraArrow.Tooltip: Travels incredibly quickly and explodes into more arrows when it hits a certain velocity
TerraArrow.TooltipTranslation: 箭矢速度非常快，当它达到一定的速度时会爆炸成更多的箭

TerraBullet.Name: Terra Bullet
TerraBullet.Tooltip: Explodes and splits into homing terra shards on death
TerraBullet.TooltipTranslation: 爆炸和分裂成自动寻的死亡碎片

Terracotta.Name: Terra-cotta
Terracotta.Tooltip:
Causes enemies to erupt into healing projectiles on death
Enemies explode on death
Terracotta.TooltipTranslation:
使敌人在死亡后释放治疗弹
敌人在爆炸中死亡

TerraEdge.Name: Terra Edge
TerraEdge.Tooltip: Heals the player on enemy hits

TerraShiv.Name: Terra Shiv
TerraShiv.Tooltip: Don't underestimate the power of shivs

Terratomere.Name: Terratomere
Terratomere.Tooltip:
Linked to the essence of Terraria
Heals the player on enemy hits
Terratomere.TooltipTranslation:
泰拉瑞亚的本质
攻击敌人会治愈自己

TheMutilator.Name: The Mutilator
TheMutilator.Tooltip:
Striking an enemy below 20% life will trigger a bloodsplosion
Bloodsplosions cause hearts to drop that can be picked up to heal you
TheMutilator.TooltipTranslation:
击杀低于20%生命的敌人将引发血溅
血溅可以治疗你

TomeofFates.Name: Tome of Fates
TomeofFates.Tooltip:
Casts cosmic tentacles to spear your enemies
Can randomly fire a brimstone tentacle for immense damage
TomeofFates.TooltipTranslation:
铸造宇宙触手来刺穿你的敌人
触手造成硫磺火效果

Tradewinds.Name: Tradewinds
Tradewinds.TooltipTranslation: 投射快速移动的阳光羽毛

TriactisTruePaladinianMageHammerofMight.Name: Triactis' True Paladinian Mage-Hammer of Might

TriactisTruePaladinianMageHammerofMightM.Name: Triactis' True Paladinian Mage-Hammer of Might

TrueArkoftheAncients.Name: True Ark of the Ancients
TrueArkoftheAncients.Tooltip: A heavenly blade forged to vanquish all evil
TrueArkoftheAncients.TooltipTranslation: 为了消灭邪恶锻造的剑

TrueBiomeBlade.Name: True Biome Blade

TrueBiomeBlade.TooltipTranslation: 不同的生物群系不同的投射物

TrueBloodyEdge.Name: True Bloody Edge

Chance to heal the player on enemy hits

TrueBloodyEdge.TooltipTranslation:
击中敌人有机率治疗你
点燃血腥的刀锋

TrueExcaliburShortsword.Name: True Excalibur Shortsword

TrueForbiddenOathblade.Name: True Forbidden Oathblade
TrueForbiddenOathblade.Tooltip: Sword of an ancient demon god

TrueNightsStabber.Name: True Night's Stabber
TrueNightsStabber.Tooltip: Don't underestimate the power of stabby knives
TrueNightsStabber.TooltipTranslation: 不要低估了短剑的力量

TrueTyrantYharimsUltisword.Name: True Tyrant's Ultisword

50% chance to give the player the tyrant's fury buff on enemy hits
This buff increases melee damage, speed, and crit chance by 30%
TrueTyrantYharimsUltisword.TooltipTranslation:
包含一个被遗忘的时代的本质
50%的机会给玩家暴君的怒火效果攻击敌人
这个效果增加近战伤害、速度和暴击几率30%

TyrantYharimsUltisword.Name: Tyrant Yharim's Ultisword
TyrantYharimsUltisword.Tooltip:
Necrotic blade of Jungle King Yharim
50% chance to give the player the tyrant's fury buff on enemy hits
This buff increases melee damage, speed, and crit chance by 30%
TyrantYharimsUltisword.TooltipTranslation:
包含一个被遗忘的时代的本质
50%的机会给玩家暴君的怒火效果攻击敌人
这个效果增加近战伤害、速度和暴击几率30%

UltraLiquidator.Name: Ultra Liquidator
UltraLiquidator.Tooltip:
Summons liquidation blades
The blades inflict ichor, cursed inferno, on fire, and frostburn
UltraLiquidator.TooltipTranslation:
召唤洁净魔叉

VanquisherArrow.Name: Vanquisher Arrow

Pierces through tiles

Casts an intense energy blast

Max damage is capped at 500,000

Revengeance drop
Vehemenc.TooltipTranslation:
施以猛烈的能量冲击
对敌人越低的HP的伤害更大
伤害上限为50万
如果敌人满HP，它会造成几个持久的debuff
复仇模式掉落

VenusianTrident.Name: Venusian Trident

VenusianTrident.TooltipTranslation: 抛出一个火爆的光球，爆发成巨大的火和岩浆碎片

Verdant.Name: Verdant

Vesuvius.Name: Vesuvius

Legendary drop

Right click to fire a spread of molten asteroids from the staff
Revengeance drop
Vesuvius.TooltipTranslation:
传说武器
小行星在击中提供熔化的buff
召唤一小群熔化的小行星
右击射击从npc身上蔓延的熔融小行星。
复仇模式掉落

Viscera.Name: Viscera
Viscera.Tooltip: The more tiles and enemies the beam bounces off of or travels through the more healing the beam does
Viscera.TooltipTranslation: 更多的碎片和敌人的光束反弹或通过更愈合的光束传播

VividClarity.Name: Vivid Clarity

Fires 3 beams of elemental energy near the mouse cursor that bounce on tile hits
These beams split into more beams when enemies are near
The more enemies and tiles the beams hit/pierce the more damage they do
VividClarity.TooltipTranslation:
在光标弹出发射3束元素能量
当敌人接近时，这些光束分裂成更多的光束
更多的光束击中/刺穿他们造成更多的伤害

XerocsGreatsword.Name: Xeroc Greatsword
XerocsGreatsword.TooltipTranslation: 发射自动寻的等离子球

YharimsCrystal.Name: Yharim's Crystal

Fires a beam of complete destruction
Only those that are worthy can use this item before Yharon is defeated
YharimsCrystal.TooltipTranslation:
点燃一束毁灭的光线
只有那些值得的人才能在丛林龙被击败之前使用这个项目

YinYo.Name: YinYo

Fires light or dark shards when enemies are near
Light shards fly up and down while dark shards fly left and right

当敌人接近时发射光明或黑暗碎片
光明碎片飞上下，黑暗碎片飞左右

Greentide.Name: Greentide

Greentide.TooltipTranslation: 在敌人的头上召唤来自水的爆炸

LureofEnthrallment.Name: Pearl of Enthrallment

LureofEnthrallment.TooltipTranslation:
召唤塞壬保护你

SirensSong.Name: Siren's Song
SirensSong.Tooltip: Casts slow-moving treble clefs that confuse enemies
SirensSong.TooltipTranslation: 铸造缓慢移动的高音谱号，迷惑敌人

BloodClotStaff.Name: Blood Clot Staff
BloodClotStaff.Tooltip: Summons a blood clot to fight for you

BloodyRupture.Name: Bloody Rupture
BloodyRupture.Tooltip: Enemies release homing blood orbs on death

DiseasedPike.Name: Diseased Pike
DiseasedPike.Tooltip: Fires plague seekers on enemy hits
DiseasedPike.TooltipTranslation: 向敌人袭来的瘟疫寻求者

PlagueStaff.Name: Plague Staff
PlagueStaff.Tooltip: Fires a spread of plague fangs

ThePlaguebringer.Name: Pandemic
ThePlaguebringer.Tooltip: Fires plague seekers when enemies are near
ThePlaguebringer.TooltipTranslation: Fires plague seekers when enemies are near

BansheeHook.Name: Banshee Hook
BansheeHook.Tooltip: Swings a banshee hook that explodes on contact

DaemonsFlame.Name: Daemon's Flame
DaemonsFlame.Tooltip: Shoots daemon flame arrows as well as regular arrows
DaemonsFlame.TooltipTranslation: 射出灵魂火焰箭和普通箭

EtherealSubjugator.Name: Ethereal Subjugator
EtherealSubjugator.Tooltip: Summons a phantom to protect you

FatesReveal.Name: Fate's Reveal
FatesReveal.Tooltip: Spawns ghostly fire that follows the player

GhastlyVisage.Name: Ghastly Visage
GhastlyVisage.Tooltip: Fires homing ghast energy that explodes
GhastlyVisage.TooltipTranslation: 发射自动寻的鬼火精华

TerrorBlade.Name: Terror Blade
TerrorBlade.Tooltip:
Fires a terror beam that bounces off tiles
On every bounce it emits an explosion
TerrorBlade.TooltipTranslation:
发射一个反弹的恐魂光束

HolyCollider.Name: Holy Collider
HolyCollider.Tooltip: Striking enemies will cause them to explode into holy fire
HolyCollider.TooltipTranslation: 打击敌人会使他们爆炸燃烧圣火

SolarFlare.Name: Solar Flare
SolarFlare.Tooltip: Emits large holy explosions on enemy hits
SolarFlare.TooltipTranslation: 在敌人的打击下发射神圣爆炸物

AbyssalTome.Name: Abyssal Tome
AbyssalTome.Tooltip: Casts a slow-moving ball of dark energy
AbyssalTome.TooltipTranslation: 铸造一个缓慢移动的暗能量球

CorroslimeStaff.Name: Corroslime Staff
CorroslimeStaff.Tooltip: Summons a corro slime to fight for you
CorroslimeStaff.TooltipTranslation: 召唤腐化史神为你而战

CrimslimeStaff.Name: Crimslime Staff
CrimslimeStaff.Tooltip: Summons a crim slime to fight for you
CrimslimeStaff.TooltipTranslation: 召唤猩红史神为你而战

EldritchTome.Name: Eldritch Tome
EldritchTome.Tooltip: Casts eldritch tentacles to spear your enemies
EldritchTome.TooltipTranslation: 用猩红触须来刺穿你的敌人

AngryChickenStaff.Name: Yharon's Kindle Staff

Summons the Son of Yharon to fight for you
The dragon increases your life regen, defense, and movement speed while summoned
The dragon imbues your melee attacks with Holy Flames while summoned

AngryChickenStaff.TooltipTranslation:
召唤丛林龙为你而战
召唤龙增加你的生命恢复、防御和移动速度
你的近战攻击带有神圣火焰
最多召唤4个

ChickenEgg.Name: Dragon Egg
ChickenEgg.Tooltip:
Summons the loyal guardian of the tyrant king
It yearns for the jungle
Not consumable
ChickenEgg.TooltipTranslation:
召唤暴君的忠诚守护者
它渴望丛林
无限使用

HellcasterFragment.Name: Yharon Soul Fragment
HellcasterFragment.Tooltip: A shard of a godly soul

YharimsGift.Name: Yharim's Gift
YharimsGift.Tooltip:
The power of a god pulses from within this artifact
Flaming meteors rain down while invincibility is active
Exploding dragon dust is left behind as you move
Defense increased by 30 and damage increased by 15%
YharimsGift.TooltipTranslation:
神的力量来自这个伪像
熊熊燃烧的流星在无敌状态下起雨来
当你移动时，爆炸的龙尘留下了
增加30防御，增加15%伤害

AerospecHat.SetBonus:
5% increased movement speed and magic critical strike chance
Taking over 25 damage in one hit will cause a spread of homing feathers to fall
Allows you to fall more quickly and disables fall damage
AerospecHat.Translation:
增加5%魔法伤害和魔法暴击率
受到一次伤害超过25的伤害时，羽毛会从天而降
允许你更快地坠落并免疫坠落伤害

AerospecHeadgear.SetBonus:
5% increased movement speed and throwing critical strike chance
Taking over 25 damage in one hit will cause a spread of homing feathers to fall
Allows you to fall more quickly and disables fall damage
AerospecHeadgear.Translation:
增加5%投掷伤害和投掷暴击率
受到一次伤害超过25的伤害时，羽毛会从天而降。
允许你更快地坠落并免疫坠落伤害

AerospecHelm.SetBonus:
5% increased movement speed and melee critical strike chance
Taking over 25 damage in one hit will cause a spread of homing feathers to fall
Allows you to fall more quickly and disables fall damage
AerospecHelm.Translation:
增加5%近战伤害和近战暴击率
受到一次伤害超过25的伤害时，羽毛会从天而降。
允许你更快地坠落并免疫坠落伤害

AerospecHelmet.SetBonus:
5% increased movement speed
Summons a valkyrie to protect you
Taking over 25 damage in one hit will cause a spread of homing feathers to fall
Allows you to fall more quickly and disables fall damage
AerospecHelmet.Translation:
增加5%移动速度
召唤一个武神来保护你 
受到一次伤害超过25的伤害时，羽毛会从天而降。
允许你更快地坠落并免疫坠落伤害

AerospecHood.SetBonus:
5% increased movement speed and ranged critical strike chance
Taking over 25 damage in one hit will cause a spread of homing feathers to fall
Allows you to fall more quickly and disables fall damage
AerospecHood.Translation:
增加5%远程伤害和远程暴击率
受到一次伤害超过25的伤害时，羽毛会从天而降。
允许你更快地坠落并免疫坠落伤害

AstralHelm.SetBonus:
25% increased movement speed
22% increased damage and critical strike chance
Whenever you crit an enemy fallen, hallowed, and astral stars will rain down
This effect has a 2 second cooldown before it can trigger again
AstralHelm.Translation:
增加25%移动速度
增加22%所有伤害和暴击率
暴击会导致神圣星辰掉落
这个效果在它再次触发之前有2秒的冷却时间

AtaxiaHeadgear.SetBonus:
5% increased ranged damage and critical strike chance
Inferno effect when below 50% life
You have a 50% chance to fire a homing chaos flare when using ranged weapons
You have a 20% chance to emit a blazing explosion when you are hit
AtaxiaHeadgear.Translation:
增加5%远程伤害和远程暴击率
低于50%生命值会有狱火效果
当你使用远程武器时，你有50%的机率发射一个追踪的混乱火弹
当你被击中的时候，你有20%的几率发生一次强烈爆炸

AtaxiaHelm.SetBonus:
5% increased melee damage and critical strike chance
Inferno effect when below 50% life
Melee attacks and projectiles cause chaos flames to erupt on enemy hits
You have a 20% chance to emit a blazing explosion when you are hit
AtaxiaHelm.Translation:
增加5%的近战攻击和近战暴击率
低于50%生命值会有狱火效果
近战攻击和抛射物会导致敌人燃烧
当你被击中的时候，你有20%的几率发生一次强烈爆炸

AtaxiaHelmet.SetBonus:
5% increased summon damage
Inferno effect when below 50% life
Summons a chaos spirit to protect you
You have a 20% chance to emit a blazing explosion when you are hit
AtaxiaHelmet.Translation:
增加5%召唤伤害
低于50%生命值会有狱火效果
召唤混沌之魂保护你
当你被击中的时候，你有20%的几率发生一次强烈爆炸

AtaxiaHood.SetBonus:
5% increased throwing damage and critical strike chance
Inferno effect when below 50% life
Throwing weapons have a 10% chance to unleash a volley of chaos flames around the player that chase enemies when used
You have a 20% chance to emit a blazing explosion when you are hit
AtaxiaHood.Translation:
增加5%的投掷伤害和暴击
低于50%生命值会有狱火效果
使用投掷武器时有10%的几率向周围发射追踪的混乱火弹
当你被击中的时候，你有20%的几率发生一次强烈爆炸

AtaxiaMask.SetBonus:
5% increased magic damage and critical strike chance
Inferno effect when below 50% life
Magic attacks summon damaging and healing flare orbs on hit
You have a 20% chance to emit a blazing explosion when you are hit
AtaxiaMask.Translation:
增加5%魔法伤害和魔法暴击率
低于50%生命值会有狱火效果
魔法攻击击中敌人产生额外伤害和治疗光球
当你被击中的时候，你有20%的几率发生一次强烈爆炸

AuricTeslaHelm.SetBonus:
Melee Tarragon, Bloodflare, God Slayer, and Silva armor effects
Reduces all damage taken by 10%, this is calculated separately from damage reduction
